descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Miles Bridges gets into the lane and gets some serious air to hammer home a thunderous dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bridges yams down a big dunk vs. Lakers) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bridges yams down a big dunk vs. Lakers

videos.description: LaMelo Ball wows the crowd with this sweet no-look, over-the-head pass to Miles Bridges for a bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo flips unreal dime to Bridges on the break) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo flips unreal dime to Bridges on the break

videos.description: Miles Bridges elevates on the fast break to throw down a flashy windmill slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bridges gets out for fast break windmill) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bridges gets out for fast-break windmill dunk

videos.description: Cody Martin comes up with a massive swat off the glass that sets up Terry Rozier to lob to Miles Bridges for a fast-break finish.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Martin's huge block sets up Bridges alley-oop) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Martin's huge block sets up Bridges alley-oop

videos.description: Russell Westbrook flexes at the crowd after he fights through contact for this and-1 layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Westbrook gets amped after this and-1 bucket) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Westbrook gets amped after this and-1 bucket

videos.description: Michael Jordan leaves his seat in frustration as the Hornets allow the Lakers to knock down three big shots to get back into the game late in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (MJ furious with Hornets in final moments vs. Lakers) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: MJ furious with Hornets in final moments vs. Lakers

videos.description: After previously nailing two huge shots in crunch time, Russell Westbrook misses the final shot for the Lakers as they lose 117-114 to the Hornets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Westbrook runs out of gas in final moments vs. Hornets) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Westbrook runs out of gas in final moments vs. Hornets
